title: The Cow
creator_credit: Dimension Films and Michael D. Murphy
brief_description: Explores the activities of cows on a peaceful day in the pasture, using natural sound and no narration. Highlights the colours and the shapes of bodies, the textures of noses and hides, the chewing of cuds. Music by Robert Emenegger.
